attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: North Korea is becoming an increasing threat to national security, not just to Britain, but to the entire world. We believe that actions are more powerful than words, and urge Downing Street to unleash their full, unabashed fury upon this puny country. Bomb everything, take no prisoners.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
